title: Review: Rapha Explore Powerweave gravel shoes deliver on stiffness, fit & versatility
content:
We’ve been riding the new Rapha Explore Powerweave gravel shoes for the past month, and they seem to offer the greatest versatility yet from any of Rapha’s shoes. Combining a bit of the best tech from both their Pro Team road and Explore gravel shoes, the new Explore Powerweaves are comfortable and probably efficient enough […]

The post Review: Rapha Explore Powerweave gravel shoes deliver on stiffness, fit & versatility appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
